channel.title: EXTREME HARD | Factions | Econ | FULL Raid PVP | 1.4.7
channel.description:
[size=24pt][b]Want a challenge with the mobs? Want to raid anywhere and pillage anything with your faction of friends? Look no further..[/b][/size]
[center][size=24pt]IP: 198.144.179.231 Port: 25565[/size][/center]
Plugins are very minimal on this server and it is a all out free for all on the server. Kill or be killed, and possible die from the extremely dangerous mobs. Sure you have see the mobs before on other servers, but these mobs have skills and work together. And don't think your safe in doors, they break down the wooden doors to get you..
Get your friends together and build your faction, because your going to need all the help you can get.
Go items to sell on the server use our ExchangeMarket to post them for all to see.
And ofcourse you can get a job to help buy the things you want on the server.
[b][i]Looking for a tamer version of the server?[/i][/b]
[center][b]IP: 199.19.119.101 PORT: 25565[/b][/center]

item.description:
@SolidSnke wrote:

[size=24pt]Want a challenge with the mobs? Want to raid anywhere and pillage anything with your faction of friends? Look no further…[/size]

[center][size=24pt]IP: 198.144.179.231
Port: 25565[/size][/center]

Plugins are very minimal on this server and it is a all out free for all on the server. Kill or be killed, and possible die from the extremely dangerous mobs. Sure you have see the mobs before on other servers, but these mobs have skills and work together. And don’t think your safe in doors, they break down the wooden doors to get you…

Get your friends together and build your faction, because your going to need all the help you can get.

Go items to sell on the server use our ExchangeMarket to post them for all to see.

And ofcourse you can get a job to help buy the things you want on the server.

Looking for a tamer version of the server?
